name: Medieval Pro Shooting
description:
Use your bow and arrow to destroy the 10 golden barrels. Inspired by Golf with Friends and Angry Birds.

Left-click to draw the bow. Use WASD to influence the arrow's trajectory mid-flight. Right-click to go back to shoot mode after firing.

Liam Shelton: Programmer

Nate Kaplan: 3D artist & level designer

SHAWNATE PRODUCTIONS

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoazUdVcNOJlt7df6gqdkXg
